org.encog.util.kmeans

Interface CentroidFactory<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - The element type for the centroid.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MLComplexData, MLData, MLDataPair, NeuralData, NeuralDataPair
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicMLComplexData, BasicMLData, BasicMLDataPair, BasicNeuralData, BasicNeuralDataPair, BiPolarNeuralData, ImageMLData, SparseMLData

    public interface CentroidFactory<O>
    An object that can create centroids.
